mapper.sql: contractAddress, blockHash, transactionHash, blockNumber, creator, createTime, status, totalSupply, ercName, ercSymbol, decimals
mapper.insert:
insert into contract
contractAddress,
blockHash,
transactionHash,
blockNumber,
creator,
createTime,
status,
totalSupply,
ercName,
ercSymbol,
decimals,
abi,
#{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{transactionhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blocknumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalsupply,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{ercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ercsymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{decimals,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{abi,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update contract
blockHash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transactionHash = #{transactionhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blockNumber = #{blocknumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalSupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ercName = #{ercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ercSymbol = #{ercsymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decimals = #{decimals,jdbcType=INTEGER},
abi = #{abi,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where contractAddress = #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update contract set blockHash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transactionHash = #{transactionhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockNumber = #{blocknumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalSupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ercName = #{ercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ercSymbol = #{ercsymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decimals = #{decimals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, abi = #{abi,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where contractAddress = #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update contract set blockHash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transactionHash = #{transactionhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockNumber = #{blocknumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalSupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ercName = #{ercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ercSymbol = #{ercsymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decimals = #{decimals,jdbcType=INTEGER} where contractAddress = #{contractaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.contractAddress, A.blockHash, A.transactionHash, A.blockNumber, A.creator, A.createTime, A.status, A.totalSupply, A.ercName, A.ercSymbol, A.decimals, B.holders FROM `contract` A left join (SELECT contractAddress, COUNT(1) as holders from erc20_balance GROUP BY contractAddress) B on A.contractAddress = B.contractAddress where A.contractAddress = #{contractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

SELECT A.contractAddress, A.blockHash, A.transactionHash, A.blockNumber, A.creator, A.createTime, A.status, A.totalSupply, A.ercName, A.ercSymbol, A.decimals, B.holders FROM `contract` A left join (SELECT contractAddress, COUNT(1) as holders from erc20_balance GROUP BY contractAddress) B on A.contractAddress = B.contractAddress order by B.holders desc

SELECT * FROM `contract` where blockNumber > 50000 or (contractAddress in ('0x6bb636db36a5f04be8faff375852862939b84442', '0x70de61b87c6bec577c30b8a37810c652ead68ea5', '0xaf5efec32837e3a609e7272c0a2fe19652cf3e56'))
